entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Who remembers when @realDonaldTrump would relentlessly insult @BarackObama for golfing and using executive orders because E.Os are for presidents that can’t negotiate with people but now golfs twice as much and issues executive orders like royal decrees almost weekly? #COVID19
